001package com.github.sormuras.bach.project;
002
003import java.nio.file.Path;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
006
007public record ProjectSpace(
008    String name, List<ProjectSpace> parents, int release, DeclaredModules modules) {
009
010  @FunctionalInterface
011  public interface Operator extends UnaryOperator<ProjectSpace> {}
012
013  public static ProjectSpace of(String name, ProjectSpace... parents) {
014    return new ProjectSpace(name, List.of(parents), 0, DeclaredModules.of());
015  }
016
017  public DeclaredModule module(String name) {
018    return modules.find(name).orElseThrow();
019  }
020
021  public ProjectSpace withParents(List<ProjectSpace> parents) {
022    return new ProjectSpace(name, parents, release, modules);
023  }
024
025  public ProjectSpace withRelease(int release) {
026    return new ProjectSpace(name, parents, release, modules);
027  }
028
029  public ProjectSpace withModule(DeclaredModule module) {
030    return new ProjectSpace(name, parents, release, modules.with(module));
031  }
032
033  public ProjectSpace withModule(String info) {
034    return withModule(Path.of(info), module -> module);
035  }
036
037  public ProjectSpace withModule(String info, String main) {
038    return withModule(Path.of(info), module -> module.withMainClass(main));
039  }
040
041  public ProjectSpace withModule(String info, DeclaredModule.Operator operator) {
042    return withModule(Path.of(info), operator);
043  }
044
045  public ProjectSpace withModule(Path info, DeclaredModule.Operator operator) {
046    return withModule(operator.apply(DeclaredModule.of(info.toString())));
047  }
048
049  ProjectSpace tweak(DeclaredModule.Tweak tweak) {
050    return this == tweak.space()
051        ? new ProjectSpace(name, parents, release, modules.tweak(tweak))
052        : this;
053  }
054}
